Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 170%{passiveImg:up_g}
*The more HP remaining*
- ATK{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 200%)
*When attacking*
- ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Disables the enemy's guard
*Per "Space-Traveling Warriors" Category ally or Extreme Class ally
on the team (depending on which has more members)*
- ATK & DEF 40%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' chance of performing a critical hit 3%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)
*When all allies are "Space-Traveling Warriors" Category characters
or Extreme Class characters*
- Performs a critical hit
- Guards all attacks
- All allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)

7683.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn, 
causes supreme damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers DEF; 
raises Extreme Class allies' 
DEF by 30% for 2 turns
